channel.title: First post on filippo.im

item.title: My first Post
item.description: Hi everyone! I am writing this page not knowing what will become of this project. I’m sure something will come to me though. What made me start this blog even though I didn’t really know what would become of it is the book: Start Now, Get Perfect Later by Rob Moore. I listened to the summary of it on 4books, a startup by Marco Montemagno, and it convinced me. The fundamental message is the one expressed in the title.
